    • Method Detail

      • getExtentBounds

        public Rect2I getExtentBounds()
        Description copied from interface: IRoomLayout
        Gets the Rect2I that encloses every room within the dungeon.

        The Bounds object has the X coordinate of the West-most room, the Y coordinate of the North-most room, the 'right' coordinate of the East-most room, and the 'bottom' coordinate of the South-most room.

        Specified by:
        getExtentBounds in interface IRoomLayout
        Returns:
        the rectangle enclosing every room within the dungeon

      • getRooms

        public SortedSet<Room> getRooms()
        Specified by:
        getRooms in interface IRoomLayout
        Returns:
        the rooms within the dungeon

        Specified by:

      • linkOneWay

        public void linkOneWay(Room room1,
                       Room room2)
        Description copied from interface: IRoomLayout
        Adds a one-way unconditional edge between the given rooms. A one-way edge may be used to travel from room1 to room2, but not room2 to room1.
        Specified by:
        linkOneWay in interface IRoomLayout
        Parameters:
        room1 - the first room to link
        room2 - the second room to link

      • link

        public void link(Room room1,
                 Room room2)
        Description copied from interface: IRoomLayout
        Adds a two-way unconditional edge between the given rooms. A two-way edge may be used to travel from each room to the other.
        Specified by:
        link in interface IRoomLayout
        Parameters:
        room1 - the first room to link
        room2 - the second room to link

      • linkOneWay

        public void linkOneWay(Room room1,
                       Room room2,
                       int cond)
        Description copied from interface: IRoomLayout
        Adds a one-way conditional edge between the given rooms. A one-way edge may be used to travel from room1 to room2, but not room2 to room1.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        room1 - the first room to link
        room2 - the second room to link

      • roomsAreLinked

        public boolean roomsAreLinked(Room room1,
                              Room room2)
        Description copied from interface: IRoomLayout
        Tests whether two rooms are linked. Two rooms are linked if there are any edges (in any direction) between them.
        Specified by:
        roomsAreLinked in interface IRoomLayout
        Returns:
        true if the rooms are linked, false otherwise
